headline: Coinbase CLO Says Base Is “Not an Exchange” Amid SEC Scrutiny
summary: Coinbase’s chief legal officer, Paul Grewal, has defended the company’s Ethereum Layer-2 network, Base, against suggestions that it should be regulated as a securities exchange.Speaking in an interview with Bankless, Grewal argued that Base functions as blockchain infrastructure rather than a platform for matching securities trades. Should @base be regulated ...
